thread.title: "My heart breaks" over NCAA decision: Pitino

title: "My heart breaks" over NCAA decision: Pitino
text:
"My heart breaks" over NCAA decision: Pitino 4:32pm EST - 01:48 
Former University of Louisville men's basketball coach Rick Pitino says the NCAA's decision that forced the team to vacate a national championship is ''unjust.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Former University of Louisville men's basketball coach Rick Pitino says the NCAA's decision that forced the team to vacate a national championship is "unjust." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
